title: Horizon II
credit_line: Purchase: gift of Mr. and Mrs. James M. Bovard
provenance_text:
Hedda Sterne, [1910-2011], New York, NY, until December 1964; Betty Parsons Gallery, New York, NY [1]; purchased by Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1965 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 376 (illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1964 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1964 - January 1965. It was lent by Betty Parsons Gallery, New York, NY, as the artist's agent (see correspondence in curatorial file.)
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the 1964 International as a gift of Mr. and Mrs. James M. Bovard, Pittsburgh, PA. Payment to the artist was sent on December 9, 1964. The painting was accessioned the following year, on May 11, 1965.
